customer|(n)|khách hàng|Ví dụ:|Mrs Wilson is one of our regular customers.
cashier|(n)|nhân viên thu ngân|Ví dụ:|Service attitude of the cashier is very friendly.
attendant|(n)|người phục vụ, nhân viên|Ví dụ:|She asked the attendant about petrol.
manager|(n)|người quản lý, giám đốc|Ví dụ:|The chef, staff and managers are all Chinese.
wallet|(n)|cái bóp, cái ví|Ví dụ:|I have lost my wallet.
purse|(n)|túi xách, ví tiền,...|Ví dụ:|My sister likes to buy designer purses.
scale|(n)|cái cân|Ví dụ:|There is the scale at the counter.
counter|(n)|quầy hàng|Ví dụ:|He picks up some fresh meat at the counter.
barcode reader|(n)|máy đọc mã vạch|Ví dụ:|Using the barcode reader is relatively simple.
receipt|(n)|biên lai, biên nhận|Ví dụ:|She recieved a receipt of bus fare.
pay|(v)|thanh toán|Ví dụ:|They paid for the car in cash.
expensive|(adj)|đắt, mắc|Ví dụ:|It's a very expensive car.
cheap|(adj)|rẻ|Ví dụ:|Food is usually cheaper in supermarkets.
discount|(n)|giảm giá|Ví dụ:|They usually give you a discount if you buy 3 products.
sell|(v)|bán|Ví dụ:|They sell drinks and snacks.
price|(n)|giá cả|Ví dụ:|The price of real estate has risen sharply.
trolley|(n)|xe đẩy|Ví dụ:|Why will supermarket trolleys never move in the direction that you push them in?
supermarket|(n)|siêu thị|Ví dụ:|My mother and my sister are going to the supermarket to buy clothes.
credit card|(n)|thẻ tín dụng|Ví dụ:|Do you accept credit card?
cash|(n)|tiền mặt|Ví dụ:|Do you have any cash on you?
shop|(n)|cửa hàng|Ví dụ:|I need to go to the shops.
money|(n)|tiền|Ví dụ:|I do not have enough money to go shopping.
basket|(n)|giỏ đựng hàng|Ví dụ:|Please give me a shopping basket.
bag|(n)|cái túi|Ví dụ:|I left my bag at the shop.
buy|(v)|mua|Ví dụ:|I bought my camera in the supermarket.
bar code|(n)|mã vạch|Ví dụ:|Goods always have bar code to control.
greengrocer|(n)|cửa hàng bán rau quả|Ví dụ:|I bought this fantastic pumpkin at the local greengrocer.
house-wares|(n)|đồ dùng gia đình, đồ gia dụng|Ví dụ:|I need to buy some housewares.
toy store|(n)|cửa hàng đồ chơi|Ví dụ:|The toy store sells many kinds of toys for children.
shopping mall|(n)|trung tâm mua sắm|Ví dụ:|Let's go to the shopping mall.
grocery store|(n)|cửa hàng tạp hóa|Ví dụ:|Grocery store is also called supermarket.
convenience store|(n)|cửa hàng tiện lợi, cửa hàng tiện dụng|Ví dụ:|More than 40,000 convenience stores can be found across Japan.
bargain|(v)|mặc cả|Ví dụ:|Mary is bargaining with the salesman to get the best deal.
refund|(n)|tiền hoàn trả|Ví dụ:|You can have a refund of your money if you're not happy with your purchase.
secondhand|(adj)|cũ; mua lại (về quần áo, sách vở,...)|Ví dụ:|This is a secondhand bookshop.
brochure|(n)|Tập quảng cáo|Ví dụ:|The local brochures|supermarket is handing out to inform customers of its upcoming sale-off campaign.
liquor store|(n)|quán rượu|Ví dụ:|My friends and me have came to a liquor store to have a drink.
drugstore|(n)|nhà thuốc (có bán mỹ phẩm và sản phẩm khác)|Ví dụ:|Last night I went to a drugstore to buy panadol.
candy store|(n)|cửa hàng bánh kẹo|Ví dụ:|My little brother always asks me to take him to the candy store.
gift shop|(n)|cửa hàng đồ lưu niệm|Ví dụ:|I usually buy something at gift shop when travelling.
pet shop|(noun phrase)|cửa hàng thú cưng|Ví dụ:|I go to a pet shop to buy a little dog.
shoe shop|(noun phrase)|cửa hàng giày dép|Ví dụ:|Goods are very fashionable in this shoe shop.
meat shop|(noun phrase)|cửa hàng thịt|Ví dụ:|I always buy pork from this meat shop.
florist|(n)|người bán hoa|Ví dụ:|The florist girl is very nice.
butcher|(n)|người bán thịt|Ví dụ:|He is a friendly butcher.
